UVA Problems

Event Planning


	
import java.util.*;



public class number11559{
    static class Hotel{
    	public int price;
    	public boolean isEnough = true;
    	public Hotel(int price, boolean isEnough){
    		this.price = price;
    		this.isEnough = isEnough;
    	}



}

public static void main(String args[]){
 	Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
 	while(sc.hasNext()){
 		int n = sc.nextInt();
     	int b = sc.nextInt();
     	int h = sc.nextInt();
     	int w = sc.nextInt();

     	Hotel[] hotellist = new Hotel[h];
 	     	

    	
     	for(int i = 0; i < h; i++){
     		int p = sc.nextInt();
     		boolean isEnough = false;
     		for(int j = 0; j < w; j++){
     			int acc = sc.nextInt();
     			if(acc >= w){
     				isEnough = true;
     			}
     		}
     		Hotel ho = new Hotel(p * n, isEnough);
     		hotellist[i] = ho;
     	}
     
     	boolean inBudget = true;
     	int min = 0;
     	for(int i = 0; i < hotellist.length; i++){
     		if(hotellist[i].isEnough == true){
     			if(hotellist[i].price < hotellist[min].price ){
     				min = i;
     			}	
     		} 
     	}	

     	if(hotellist[min].price >= b){
     		inBudget = false;
     	}

     	if(!inBudget){
     		System.out.println("stay home");
     	} else {
     		System.out.println(hotellist[min].price);
     	}

 	}
}    }
